artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 236, horizontal chūban #24.53
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Looking forward to spring,
I\'ve been counting the rainy days.
Here comes another rain and
the grass by the road is sprouting.
It\'s time to travel to Kusatsu.

Tanaoshimi no
hikazu kasane te
harusame ni
mgumu Kusatsu no
tabi no shibakusa

by Shibaguchiya Okazumi
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi 東海道五十三次), also known as the Kyōka Tōkaidō
title: Kusatsu
